                              <div class="line">Who doth permit the base contagious clouds</div>
                              <div class="line">To smother up his beauty from the world,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, when he please again to be himself,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being wanted, he may be more wonder'd at,</div>
                              <div class="line">By breaking through the foul and ugly mists</div>
                              <div class="line">Of vapours that did seem to strangle him.</div>
                              <div class="line">If all the year were playing holidays,</div>
                              <div class="line">To sport would be as tedious as to work;</div>
                              <div class="line">But when they seldom come, they wish'd for come,</div>
                              <div class="line">And nothing pleaseth but rare accidents.</div>
                              <div class="line">So, when this loose behavior I throw off</div>
                              <div class="line">And pay the debt I never promised,</div>
                              <div class="line">By how much better than my word I am,</div>
                              <div class="line">By so much shall I falsify men's hopes;</div>
                              <div class="line">And like bright metal on a sullen ground,</div>
                              <div class="line">My reformation, glittering o'er my fault,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall show more goodly and attract more eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">Than that which hath no foil to set it off.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll so offend, to make offence a skill;</div>
                              <div class="line">Redeeming time when men think least I will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  London. The palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter the KING, NORTHUMBERLAND, WORCESTER, HOTSPUR,
SIR WALTER BLUNT, with others</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">My blood hath been too cold and temperate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unapt to stir at these indignities,</div>
                              <div class="line">And you have found me; for accordingly</div>
                              <div class="line">You tread upon my patience: but be sure</div>
                              <div class="line">I will from henceforth rather be myself,</div>
                              <div class="line">Mighty and to be fear'd, than my condition;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which hath been smooth as oil, soft as young down,</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore lost that title of respect</div>
                              <div class="line">Which the proud soul ne'er pays but to the proud.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Our house, my sovereign liege, little deserves</div>
                              <div class="line">The scourge of greatness to be used on it;</div>
                              <div class="line">And that same greatness too which our own hands</div>
                              <div class="line">Have holp to make so portly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord.--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">Worcester, get thee gone; for I do see</div>
                              <div class="line">Danger and disobedience in thine eye:</div>
                              <div class="line">O, sir, your presence is too bold and peremptory,</div>
                              <div class="line">And majesty might never yet endure</div>
                              <div class="line">The moody frontier of a servant brow.</div>
                              <div class="line">You have good leave to leave us: when we need</div>
                              <div class="line">Your use and counsel, we shall send for you.</div>
                              <p>Exit Worcester</p>
                              <div class="line">You were about to speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>To North</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, my good lord.</div>
                              <div class="line">Those prisoners in your highness' name demanded,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which Harry Percy here at Holmedon took,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were, as he says, not with such strength denied</div>
                              <div class="line">As is deliver'd to your majesty:</div>
                              <div class="line">Either envy, therefore, or misprison</div>
                              <div class="line">Is guilty of this fault and not my son.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">My liege, I did deny no prisoners.</div>
                              <div class="line">But I remember, when the fight was done,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I was dry with rage and extreme toil,</div>
                              <div class="line">Breathless and faint, leaning upon my sword,</div>
                              <div class="line">Came there a certain lord, neat, and trimly dress'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fresh as a bridegroom; and his chin new reap'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Show'd like a stubble-land at harvest-home;</div>
                              <div class="line">He was perfumed like a milliner;</div>
                              <div class="line">And 'twixt his finger and his thumb he held</div>
                              <div class="line">A pouncet-box, which ever and anon</div>
                              <div class="line">He gave his nose and took't away again;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who therewith angry, when it next came there,</div>
                              <div class="line">Took it in snuff; and still he smiled and talk'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">And as the soldiers bore dead bodies by,</div>
                              <div class="line">He call'd them untaught knaves, unmannerly,</div>
                              <div class="line">To bring a slovenly unhandsome corse</div>
                              <div class="line">Betwixt the wind and his nobility.</div>
                              <div class="line">With many holiday and lady terms</div>
                              <div class="line">He question'd me; amongst the rest, demanded</div>
                              <div class="line">My prisoners in your majesty's behalf.</div>
                              <div class="line">I then, all smarting with my wounds being cold,</div>
                              <div class="line">To be so pester'd with a popinjay,</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of my grief and my impatience,</div>
                              <div class="line">Answer'd neglectingly I know not what,</div>
                              <div class="line">He should or he should not; for he made me mad</div>
                              <div class="line">To see him shine so brisk and smell so sweet</div>
                              <div class="line">And talk so like a waiting-gentlewoman</div>
                              <div class="line">Of guns and drums and wounds,--God save the mark!--</div>
                              <div class="line">And telling me the sovereign'st thing on earth</div>
                              <div class="line">Was parmaceti for an inward bruise;</div>
                              <div class="line">And that it was great pity, so it was,</div>
                              <div class="line">This villanous salt-petre should be digg'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of the bowels of the harmless earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which many a good tall fellow had destroy'd</div>
                              <div class="line">So cowardly; and but for these vile guns,</div>
                              <div class="line">He would himself have been a soldier.</div>
                              <div class="line">This bald unjointed chat of his, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">I answer'd indirectly, as I said;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I beseech you, let not his report</div>
                              <div class="line">Come current for an accusation</div>
                              <div class="line">Betwixt my love and your high majesty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR WALTER BLUNT</div>
                              <div class="line">The circumstance consider'd, good my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whate'er Lord Harry Percy then had said</div>
                              <div class="line">To such a person and in such a place,</div>
                              <div class="line">At such a time, with all the rest retold,</div>
                              <div class="line">May reasonably die and never rise</div>
                              <div class="line">To do him wrong or any way impeach</div>
                              <div class="line">What then he said, so he unsay it now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, yet he doth deny his prisoners,</div>
                              <div class="line">But with proviso and exception,</div>
                              <div class="line">That we at our own charge shall ransom straight</div>
                              <div class="line">His brother-in-law, the foolish Mortimer;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, on my soul, hath wilfully betray'd</div>
                              <div class="line">The lives of those that he did lead to fight</div>
                              <div class="line">Against that great magician, damn'd Glendower,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose daughter, as we hear, the Earl of March</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath lately married. Shall our coffers, then,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be emptied to redeem a traitor home?</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall we but treason? and indent with fears,</div>
                              <div class="line">When they have lost and forfeited themselves?</div>
                              <div class="line">No, on the barren mountains let him starve;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I shall never hold that man my friend</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose tongue shall ask me for one penny cost</div>
                              <div class="line">To ransom home revolted Mortimer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Revolted Mortimer!</div>
                              <div class="line">He never did fall off, my sovereign liege,</div>
                              <div class="line">But by the chance of war; to prove that true</div>
                              <div class="line">Needs no more but one tongue for all those wounds,</div>
                              <div class="line">Those mouthed wounds, which valiantly he took</div>
                              <div class="line">When on the gentle Severn's sedgy bank,</div>
                              <div class="line">In single opposition, hand to hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">He did confound the best part of an hour</div>
                              <div class="line">In changing hardiment with great Glendower:</div>
                              <div class="line">Three times they breathed and three times did</div>
                              <div class="line">they drink,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon agreement, of swift Severn's flood;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who then, affrighted with their bloody looks,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ran fearfully among the trembling reeds,</div>
                              <div class="line">And hid his crisp head in the hollow bank,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bloodstained with these valiant combatants.</div>
                              <div class="line">Never did base and rotten policy</div>
                              <div class="line">Colour her working with such deadly wounds;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor could the noble Mortimer</div>
                              <div class="line">Receive so many, and all willingly:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then let not him be slander'd with revolt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou dost belie him, Percy, thou dost belie him;</div>
                              <div class="line">He never did encounter with Glendower:</div>
                              <div class="line">I tell thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">He durst as well have met the devil alone</div>
                              <div class="line">As Owen Glendower for an enemy.</div>
                              <div class="line">Art thou not ashamed? But, sirrah, henceforth</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me not hear you speak of Mortimer:</div>
                              <div class="line">Send me your prisoners with the speediest means,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or you shall hear in such a kind from me</div>
                              <div class="line">As will displease you. My Lord Northumberland,</div>
                              <div class="line">We licence your departure with your son.</div>
                              <div class="line">Send us your prisoners, or you will hear of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt King Henry, Blunt, and train</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">An if the devil come and roar for them,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not send them: I will after straight</div>
                              <div class="line">And tell him so; for I will ease my heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">Albeit I make a hazard of my head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">What, drunk with choler? stay and pause awhile:</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes your uncle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter WORCESTER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak of Mortimer!</div>
                              <div class="line">'Zounds, I will speak of him; and let my soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Want mercy, if I do not join with him:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, on his part I'll empty all these veins,</div>
                              <div class="line">And shed my dear blood drop by drop in the dust,</div>
                              <div class="line">But I will lift the down-trod Mortimer</div>
                              <div class="line">As high in the air as this unthankful king,</div>
                              <div class="line">As this ingrate and canker'd Bolingbroke.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Brother, the king hath made your nephew mad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Who struck this heat up after I was gone?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">He will, forsooth, have all my prisoners;</div>
                              <div class="line">And when I urged the ransom once again</div>
                              <div class="line">Of my wife's brother, then his cheek look'd pale,</div>
                              <div class="line">And on my face he turn'd an eye of death,</div>
                              <div class="line">Trembling even at the name of Mortimer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot blame him: was not he proclaim'd</div>
                              <div class="line">By Richard that dead is the next of blood?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">He was; I heard the proclamation:</div>
                              <div class="line">And then it was when the unhappy king,</div>
                              <div class="line">--Whose wrongs in us God pardon!--did set forth</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon his Irish expedition;</div>
                              <div class="line">From whence he intercepted did return</div>
                              <div class="line">To be deposed and shortly murdered.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">And for whose death we in the world's wide mouth</div>
                              <div class="line">Live scandalized and foully spoken of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">But soft, I pray you; did King Richard then</div>
                              <div class="line">Proclaim my brother Edmund Mortimer</div>
                              <div class="line">Heir to the crown?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">He did; myself did hear it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, then I cannot blame his cousin king,</div>
                              <div class="line">That wished him on the barren mountains starve.</div>
                              <div class="line">But shall it be that you, that set the crown</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the head of this forgetful man</div>
                              <div class="line">And for his sake wear the detested blot</div>
                              <div class="line">Of murderous subornation, shall it be,</div>
                              <div class="line">That you a world of curses undergo,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being the agents, or base second means,</div>
                              <div class="line">The cords, the ladder, or the hangman rather?</div>
                              <div class="line">O, pardon me that I descend so low,</div>
                              <div class="line">To show the line and the predicament</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein you range under this subtle king;</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall it for shame be spoken in these days,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or fill up chronicles in time to come,</div>
                              <div class="line">That men of your nobility and power</div>
                              <div class="line">Did gage them both in an unjust behalf,</div>
                              <div class="line">As both of you--God pardon it!--have done,</div>
                              <div class="line">To put down Richard, that sweet lovely rose,</div>
                              <div class="line">An plant this thorn, this canker, Bolingbroke?</div>
                              <div class="line">And shall it in more shame be further spoken,</div>
                              <div class="line">That you are fool'd, discarded and shook off</div>
                              <div class="line">By him for whom these shames ye underwent?</div>
                              <div class="line">No; yet time serves wherein you may redeem</div>
                              <div class="line">Your banish'd honours and restore yourselves</div>
                              <div class="line">Into the good thoughts of the world again,</div>
                              <div class="line">Revenge the jeering and disdain'd contempt</div>
                              <div class="line">Of this proud king, who studies day and night</div>
                              <div class="line">To answer all the debt he owes to you</div>
                              <div class="line">Even with the bloody payment of your deaths:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore, I say--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, cousin, say no more:</div>
                              <div class="line">And now I will unclasp a secret book,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to your quick-conceiving discontents</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll read you matter deep and dangerous,</div>
                              <div class="line">As full of peril and adventurous spirit</div>
                              <div class="line">As to o'er-walk a current roaring loud</div>
                              <div class="line">On the unsteadfast footing of a spear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">If he fall in, good night! or sink or swim:</div>
                              <div class="line">Send danger from the east unto the west,</div>
                              <div class="line">So honour cross it from the north to south,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let them grapple: O, the blood more stirs</div>
                              <div class="line">To rouse a lion than to start a hare!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Imagination of some great exploit</div>
                              <div class="line">Drives him beyond the bounds of patience.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, methinks it were an easy leap,</div>
                              <div class="line">To pluck bright honour from the pale-faced moon,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or dive into the bottom of the deep,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where fathom-line could never touch the ground,</div>
                              <div class="line">And pluck up drowned honour by the locks;</div>
                              <div class="line">So he that doth redeem her thence might wear</div>
                              <div class="line">Without corrival, all her dignities:</div>
                              <div class="line">But out upon this half-faced fellowship!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">He apprehends a world of figures here,</div>
                              <div class="line">But not the form of what he should attend.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good cousin, give me audience for a while.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">I cry you mercy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Those same noble Scots</div>
                              <div class="line">That are your prisoners,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll keep them all;</div>
                              <div class="line">By God, he shall not have a Scot of them;</div>
                              <div class="line">No, if a Scot would save his soul, he shall not:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll keep them, by this hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">You start away</div>
                              <div class="line">And lend no ear unto my purposes.</div>
                              <div class="line">Those prisoners you shall keep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I will; that's flat:</div>
                              <div class="line">He said he would not ransom Mortimer;</div>
                              <div class="line">Forbad my tongue to speak of Mortimer;</div>
                              <div class="line">But I will find him when he lies asleep,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in his ear I'll holla 'Mortimer!'</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll have a starling shall be taught to speak</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing but 'Mortimer,' and give it him</div>
                              <div class="line">To keep his anger still in motion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear you, cousin; a word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">All studies here I solemnly defy,</div>
                              <div class="line">Save how to gall and pinch this Bolingbroke:</div>
                              <div class="line">And that same sword-and-buckler Prince of Wales,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that I think his father loves him not</div>
                              <div class="line">And would be glad he met with some mischance,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would have him poison'd with a pot of ale.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, kinsman: I'll talk to you</div>
                              <div class="line">When you are better temper'd to attend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what a wasp-stung and impatient fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Art thou to break into this woman's mood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Tying thine ear to no tongue but thine own!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, look you, I am whipp'd and scourged with rods,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nettled and stung with pismires, when I hear</div>
                              <div class="line">Of this vile politician, Bolingbroke.</div>
                              <div class="line">In Richard's time,--what do you call the place?--</div>
                              <div class="line">A plague upon it, it is in Gloucestershire;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas where the madcap duke his uncle kept,</div>
                              <div class="line">His uncle York; where I first bow'd my knee</div>
                              <div class="line">Unto this king of smiles, this Bolingbroke,--</div>
                              <div class="line">'Sblood!--</div>
                              <div class="line">When you and he came back from Ravenspurgh.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">At Berkley castle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">You say true:</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what a candy deal of courtesy</div>
                              <div class="line">This fawning greyhound then did proffer me!</div>
                              <div class="line">Look,'when his infant fortune came to age,'</div>
                              <div class="line">And 'gentle Harry Percy,' and 'kind cousin;'</div>
                              <div class="line">O, the devil take such cozeners! God forgive me!</div>
                              <div class="line">Good uncle, tell your tale; I have done.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, if you have not, to it again;</div>
                              <div class="line">We will stay your leisure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">I have done, i' faith.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Then once more to your Scottish prisoners.</div>
                              <div class="line">Deliver them up without their ransom straight,</div>
                              <div class="line">And make the Douglas' son your only mean</div>
                              <div class="line">For powers in Scotland; which, for divers reasons</div>
                              <div class="line">Which I shall send you written, be assured,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will easily be granted. You, my lord,</div>
                              <p>To Northumberland</p>
                              <div class="line">Your son in Scotland being thus employ'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall secretly into the bosom creep</div>
                              <div class="line">Of that same noble prelate, well beloved,</div>
                              <div class="line">The archbishop.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Of York, is it not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">True; who bears hard</div>
                              <div class="line">His brother's death at Bristol, the Lord Scroop.</div>
                              <div class="line">I speak not this in estimation,</div>
                              <div class="line">As what I think might be, but what I know</div>
                              <div class="line">Is ruminated, plotted and set down,</div>
                              <div class="line">And only stays but to behold the face</div>
                              <div class="line">Of that occasion that shall bring it on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">I smell it: upon my life, it will do well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Before the game is afoot, thou still let'st slip.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, it cannot choose but be a noble plot;</div>
                              <div class="line">And then the power of Scotland and of York,</div>
                              <div class="line">To join with Mortimer, ha?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">And so they shall.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">In faith, it is exceedingly well aim'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">And 'tis no little reason bids us speed,</div>
                              <div class="line">To save our heads by raising of a head;</div>
                              <div class="line">For, bear ourselves as even as we can,</div>
                              <div class="line">The king will always think him in our debt,</div>
                              <div class="line">And think we think ourselves unsatisfied,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till he hath found a time to pay us home:</div>
                              <div class="line">And see already how he doth begin</div>
                              <div class="line">To make us strangers to his looks of love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">He does, he does: we'll be revenged on him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Cousin, farewell: no further go in this</div>
                              <div class="line">Than I by letters shall direct your course.</div>
                              <div class="line">When time is ripe, which will be suddenly,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll steal to Glendower and Lord Mortimer;</div>
                              <div class="line">Where you and Douglas and our powers at once,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I will fashion it, shall happily meet,</div>
                              <div class="line">To bear our fortunes in our own strong arms,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which now we hold at much uncertainty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, good brother: we shall thrive, I trust.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Uncle, Adieu: O, let the hours be short</div>
                              <div class="line">Till fields and blows and groans applaud our sport!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  Rochester. An inn yard.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  The highway, near Gadshill.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.4">3. SCENE III.  Warkworth castle</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.5">4. SCENE IV.  The Boar's-Head Tavern, Eastcheap.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Rochester. An inn yard.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter a Carrier with a lantern in his hand</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">Heigh-ho! an it be not four by the day, I'll be</div>
                              <div class="line">hanged: Charles' wain is over the new chimney, and</div>
                              <div class="line">yet our horse not packed. What, ostler!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ostler</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>   Anon, anon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, Tom, beat Cut's saddle, put a few flocks</div>
                              <div class="line">in the point; poor jade, is wrung in the withers out</div>
                              <div class="line">of all cess.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter another Carrier</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">Peas and beans are as dank here as a dog, and that</div>
                              <div class="line">is the next way to give poor jades the bots: this</div>
                              <div class="line">house is turned upside down since Robin Ostler died.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor fellow, never joyed since the price of oats</div>
                              <div class="line">rose; it was the death of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">I think this be the most villanous house in all</div>
                              <div class="line">London road for fleas: I am stung like a tench.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">Like a tench! by the mass, there is ne'er a king</div>
                              <div class="line">christen could be better bit than I have been since</div>
                              <div class="line">the first cock.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, they will allow us ne'er a jordan, and then we</div>
                              <div class="line">leak in your chimney; and your chamber-lie breeds</div>
                              <div class="line">fleas like a loach.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">What, ostler! come away and be hanged!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">I have a gammon of bacon and two razors of ginger,</div>
                              <div class="line">to be delivered as far as Charing-cross.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">God's body! the turkeys in my pannier are quite</div>
                              <div class="line">starved. What, ostler! A plague on thee! hast thou</div>
                              <div class="line">never an eye in thy head? canst not hear? An</div>
                              <div class="line">'twere not as good deed as drink, to break the pate</div>
                              <div class="line">on thee, I am a very villain. Come, and be hanged!</div>
                              <div class="line">hast thou no faith in thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter GADSHILL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, carriers. What's o'clock?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">I think it be two o'clock.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray thee lend me thy lantern, to see my gelding</div>
                              <div class="line">in the stable.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, by God, soft; I know a trick worth two of that, i' faith.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray thee, lend me thine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, when? can'st tell? Lend me thy lantern, quoth</div>
                              <div class="line">he? marry, I'll see thee hanged first.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah carrier, what time do you mean to come to London?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Carrier</div>
                              <div class="line">Time enough to go to bed with a candle, I warrant</div>
                              <div class="line">thee. Come, neighbour Mugs, we'll call up the</div>
                              <div class="line">gentleman: they will along with company, for they</div>
                              <div class="line">have great charge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt carriers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">What, ho! chamberlain!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chamberlain</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  At hand, quoth pick-purse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">That's even as fair as--at hand, quoth the</div>
                              <div class="line">chamberlain; for thou variest no more from picking</div>
                              <div class="line">of purses than giving direction doth from labouring;</div>
                              <div class="line">thou layest the plot how.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Chamberlain</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chamberlain</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, Master Gadshill. It holds current that</div>
                              <div class="line">I told you yesternight: there's a franklin in the</div>
                              <div class="line">wild of Kent hath brought three hundred marks with</div>
                              <div class="line">him in gold: I heard him tell it to one of his</div>
                              <div class="line">company last night at supper; a kind of auditor; one</div>
                              <div class="line">that hath abundance of charge too, God knows what.</div>
                              <div class="line">They are up already, and call for eggs and butter;</div>
                              <div class="line">they will away presently.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, if they meet not with Saint Nicholas'</div>
                              <div class="line">clerks, I'll give thee this neck.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chamberlain</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I'll none of it: I pray thee keep that for the</div>
                              <div class="line">hangman; for I know thou worshippest St. Nicholas</div>
                              <div class="line">as truly as a man of falsehood may.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">What talkest thou to me of the hangman? if I hang,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll make a fat pair of gallows; for if I hang, old</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John hangs with me, and thou knowest he is no</div>
                              <div class="line">starveling. Tut! there are other Trojans that thou</div>
                              <div class="line">dreamest not of, the which for sport sake are</div>
                              <div class="line">content to do the profession some grace; that would,</div>
                              <div class="line">if matters should be looked into, for their own</div>
                              <div class="line">credit sake, make all whole. I am joined with no</div>
                              <div class="line">foot-land rakers, no long-staff sixpenny strikers,</div>
                              <div class="line">none of these mad mustachio purple-hued malt-worms;</div>
                              <div class="line">but with nobility and tranquillity, burgomasters and</div>
                              <div class="line">great oneyers, such as can hold in, such as will</div>
                              <div class="line">strike sooner than speak, and speak sooner than</div>
                              <div class="line">drink, and drink sooner than pray: and yet, zounds,</div>
                              <div class="line">I lie; for they pray continually to their saint, the</div>
                              <div class="line">commonwealth; or rather, not pray to her, but prey</div>
                              <div class="line">on her, for they ride up and down on her and make</div>
                              <div class="line">her their boots.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chamberlain</div>
                              <div class="line">What, the commonwealth their boots? will she hold</div>
                              <div class="line">out water in foul way?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">She will, she will; justice hath liquored her. We</div>
                              <div class="line">steal as in a castle, cocksure; we have the receipt</div>
                              <div class="line">of fern-seed, we walk invisible.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chamberlain</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, by my faith, I think you are more beholding to</div>
                              <div class="line">the night than to fern-seed for your walking invisible.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me thy hand: thou shalt have a share in our</div>
                              <div class="line">purchase, as I am a true man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Chamberlain</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, rather let me have it, as you are a false thief.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to; 'homo' is a common name to all men. Bid the</div>
                              <div class="line">ostler bring my gelding out of the stable. Farewell,</div>
                              <div class="line">you muddy knave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  The highway, near Gadshill.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter PRINCE HENRY and POINS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, shelter, shelter: I have removed Falstaff's</div>
                              <div class="line">horse, and he frets like a gummed velvet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand close.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Poins! Poins, and be hanged! Poins!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, ye fat-kidneyed rascal! what a brawling dost</div>
                              <div class="line">thou keep!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Where's Poins, Hal?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">He is walked up to the top of the hill: I'll go seek him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I am accursed to rob in that thief's company: the</div>
                              <div class="line">rascal hath removed my horse, and tied him I know</div>
                              <div class="line">not where. If I travel but four foot by the squier</div>
                              <div class="line">further afoot, I shall break my wind. Well, I doubt</div>
                              <div class="line">not but to die a fair death for all this, if I</div>
                              <div class="line">'scape hanging for killing that rogue. I have</div>
                              <div class="line">forsworn his company hourly any time this two and</div>
                              <div class="line">twenty years, and yet I am bewitched with the</div>
                              <div class="line">rogue's company. If the rascal hath not given me</div>
                              <div class="line">medicines to make me love him, I'll be hanged; it</div>
                              <div class="line">could not be else: I have drunk medicines. Poins!</div>
                              <div class="line">Hal! a plague upon you both! Bardolph! Peto!</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll starve ere I'll rob a foot further. An 'twere</div>
                              <div class="line">not as good a deed as drink, to turn true man and to</div>
                              <div class="line">leave these rogues, I am the veriest varlet that</div>
                              <div class="line">ever chewed with a tooth. Eight yards of uneven</div>
                              <div class="line">ground is threescore and ten miles afoot with me;</div>
                              <div class="line">and the stony-hearted villains know it well enough:</div>
                              <div class="line">a plague upon it when thieves cannot be true one to another!</div>
                              <p>They whistle</p>
                              <div class="line">Whew! A plague upon you all! Give me my horse, you</div>
                              <div class="line">rogues; give me my horse, and be hanged!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, ye fat-guts! lie down; lay thine ear close</div>
                              <div class="line">to the ground and list if thou canst hear the tread</div>
                              <div class="line">of travellers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you any levers to lift me up again, being down?</div>
                              <div class="line">'Sblood, I'll not bear mine own flesh so far afoot</div>
                              <div class="line">again for all the coin in thy father's exchequer.</div>
                              <div class="line">What a plague mean ye to colt me thus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou liest; thou art not colted, thou art uncolted.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, good Prince Hal, help me to my horse,</div>
                              <div class="line">good king's son.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Out, ye rogue! shall I be your ostler?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, hang thyself in thine own heir-apparent</div>
                              <div class="line">garters! If I be ta'en, I'll peach for this. An I</div>
                              <div class="line">have not ballads made on you all and sung to filthy</div>
                              <div class="line">tunes, let a cup of sack be my poison: when a jest</div>
                              <div class="line">is so forward, and afoot too! I hate it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter GADSHILL, BARDOLPH and PETO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">So I do, against my will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">O, 'tis our setter: I know his voice. Bardolph,</div>
                              <div class="line">what news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Case ye, case ye; on with your vizards: there 's</div>
                              <div class="line">money of the king's coming down the hill; 'tis going</div>
                              <div class="line">to the king's exchequer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">You lie, ye rogue; 'tis going to the king's tavern.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">There's enough to make us all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">To be hanged.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirs, you four shall front them in the narrow lane;</div>
                              <div class="line">Ned Poins and I will walk lower: if they 'scape</div>
                              <div class="line">from your encounter, then they light on us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETO</div>
                              <div class="line">How many be there of them?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">Some eight or ten.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">'Zounds, will they not rob us?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">What, a coward, Sir John Paunch?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, I am not John of Gaunt, your grandfather;</div>
                              <div class="line">but yet no coward, Hal.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, we leave that to the proof.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah Jack, thy horse stands behind the hedge:</div>
                              <div class="line">when thou needest him, there thou shalt find him.</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, and stand fast.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Now cannot I strike him, if I should be hanged.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ned, where are our disguises?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, hard by: stand close.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt PRINCE HENRY and POINS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, my masters, happy man be his dole, say I:</div>
                              <div class="line">every man to his business.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter the Travellers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Traveller</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, neighbour: the boy shall lead our horses down</div>
                              <div class="line">the hill; we'll walk afoot awhile, and ease our legs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Thieves</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Travellers</div>
                              <div class="line">Jesus bless us!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Strike; down with them; cut the villains' throats:</div>
                              <div class="line">ah! whoreson caterpillars! bacon-fed knaves! they</div>
                              <div class="line">hate us youth: down with them: fleece them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Travellers</div>
