                              <div class="line">O, we are undone, both we and ours for ever!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang ye, gorbellied knaves, are ye undone? No, ye</div>
                              <div class="line">fat chuffs: I would your store were here! On,</div>
                              <div class="line">bacons, on! What, ye knaves! young men must live.</div>
                              <div class="line">You are Grand-jurors, are ye? we'll jure ye, 'faith.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Here they rob them and bind them. Exeunt</p>
                        <p>Re-enter PRINCE HENRY and POINS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">The thieves have bound the true men. Now could thou</div>
                              <div class="line">and I rob the thieves and go merrily to London, it</div>
                              <div class="line">would be argument for a week, laughter for a month</div>
                              <div class="line">and a good jest for ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand close; I hear them coming.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter the Thieves again</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, my masters, let us share, and then to horse</div>
                              <div class="line">before day. An the Prince and Poins be not two</div>
                              <div class="line">arrant cowards, there's no equity stirring: there's</div>
                              <div class="line">no more valour in that Poins than in a wild-duck.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Your money!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Villains!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>As they are sharing, the Prince and Poins set upon
them; they all run away; and Falstaff, after a blow
or two, runs away too, leaving the booty behind them</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Got with much ease. Now merrily to horse:</div>
                              <div class="line">The thieves are all scatter'd and possess'd with fear</div>
                              <div class="line">So strongly that they dare not meet each other;</div>
                              <div class="line">Each takes his fellow for an officer.</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, good Ned. Falstaff sweats to death,</div>
                              <div class="line">And lards the lean earth as he walks along:</div>
                              <div class="line">Were 't not for laughing, I should pity him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">How the rogue roar'd!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  Warkworth castle</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter HOTSPUR, solus, reading a letter</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">'But for mine own part, my lord, I could be well</div>
                              <div class="line">contented to be there, in respect of the love I bear</div>
                              <div class="line">your house.' He could be contented: why is he not,</div>
                              <div class="line">then? In respect of the love he bears our house:</div>
                              <div class="line">he shows in this, he loves his own barn better than</div>
                              <div class="line">he loves our house. Let me see some more. 'The</div>
                              <div class="line">purpose you undertake is dangerous;'--why, that's</div>
                              <div class="line">certain: 'tis dangerous to take a cold, to sleep, to</div>
                              <div class="line">drink; but I tell you, my lord fool, out of this</div>
                              <div class="line">nettle, danger, we pluck this flower, safety. 'The</div>
                              <div class="line">purpose you undertake is dangerous; the friends you</div>
                              <div class="line">have named uncertain; the time itself unsorted; and</div>
                              <div class="line">your whole plot too light for the counterpoise of so</div>
                              <div class="line">great an opposition.' Say you so, say you so? I say</div>
                              <div class="line">unto you again, you are a shallow cowardly hind, and</div>
                              <div class="line">you lie.  What a lack-brain is this! By the Lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">our plot is a good plot as ever was laid; our</div>
                              <div class="line">friends true and constant: a good plot, good</div>
                              <div class="line">friends, and full of expectation; an excellent plot,</div>
                              <div class="line">very good friends. What a frosty-spirited rogue is</div>
                              <div class="line">this! Why, my lord of York commends the plot and the</div>
                              <div class="line">general course of action. 'Zounds, an I were now by</div>
                              <div class="line">this rascal, I could brain him with his lady's fan.</div>
                              <div class="line">Is there not my father, my uncle and myself? lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Edmund Mortimer, My lord of York and Owen Glendower?</div>
                              <div class="line">is there not besides the Douglas? have I not all</div>
                              <div class="line">their letters to meet me in arms by the ninth of the</div>
                              <div class="line">next month? and are they not some of them set</div>
                              <div class="line">forward already? What a pagan rascal is this! an</div>
                              <div class="line">infidel! Ha! you shall see now in very sincerity</div>
                              <div class="line">of fear and cold heart, will he to the king and lay</div>
                              <div class="line">open all our proceedings. O, I could divide myself</div>
                              <div class="line">and go to buffets, for moving such a dish of</div>
                              <div class="line">skim milk with so honourable an action! Hang him!</div>
                              <div class="line">let him tell the king: we are prepared. I will set</div>
                              <div class="line">forward to-night.</div>
                              <p>Enter LADY PERCY</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Kate! I must leave you within these two hours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">O, my good lord, why are you thus alone?</div>
                              <div class="line">For what offence have I this fortnight been</div>
                              <div class="line">A banish'd woman from my Harry's bed?</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, sweet lord, what is't that takes from thee</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy stomach, pleasure and thy golden sleep?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why dost thou bend thine eyes upon the earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">And start so often when thou sit'st alone?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why hast thou lost the fresh blood in thy cheeks;</div>
                              <div class="line">And given my treasures and my rights of thee</div>
                              <div class="line">To thick-eyed musing and cursed melancholy?</div>
                              <div class="line">In thy faint slumbers I by thee have watch'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">And heard thee murmur tales of iron wars;</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak terms of manage to thy bounding steed;</div>
                              <div class="line">Cry 'Courage! to the field!' And thou hast talk'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Of sallies and retires, of trenches, tents,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of palisadoes, frontiers, parapets,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of basilisks, of cannon, culverin,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of prisoners' ransom and of soldiers slain,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all the currents of a heady fight.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy spirit within thee hath been so at war</div>
                              <div class="line">And thus hath so bestirr'd thee in thy sleep,</div>
                              <div class="line">That beads of sweat have stood upon thy brow</div>
                              <div class="line">Like bubbles in a late-disturbed stream;</div>
                              <div class="line">And in thy face strange motions have appear'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Such as we see when men restrain their breath</div>
                              <div class="line">On some great sudden hest. O, what portents are these?</div>
                              <div class="line">Some heavy business hath my lord in hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I must know it, else he loves me not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">What, ho!</div>
                              <p>Enter Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">Is Gilliams with the packet gone?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">He is, my lord, an hour ago.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath Butler brought those horses from the sheriff?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">One horse, my lord, he brought even now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">What horse? a roan, a crop-ear, is it not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">It is, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">That roan shall by my throne.</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I will back him straight: O esperance!</div>
                              <div class="line">Bid Butler lead him forth into the park.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit Servant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">But hear you, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">What say'st thou, my lady?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">What is it carries you away?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, my horse, my love, my horse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">Out, you mad-headed ape!</div>
                              <div class="line">A weasel hath not such a deal of spleen</div>
                              <div class="line">As you are toss'd with. In faith,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll know your business, Harry, that I will.</div>
                              <div class="line">I fear my brother Mortimer doth stir</div>
                              <div class="line">About his title, and hath sent for you</div>
                              <div class="line">To line his enterprise: but if you go,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">So far afoot, I shall be weary, love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, you paraquito, answer me</div>
                              <div class="line">Directly unto this question that I ask:</div>
                              <div class="line">In faith, I'll break thy little finger, Harry,</div>
                              <div class="line">An if thou wilt not tell me all things true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Away,</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, you trifler! Love! I love thee not,</div>
                              <div class="line">I care not for thee, Kate: this is no world</div>
                              <div class="line">To play with mammets and to tilt with lips:</div>
                              <div class="line">We must have bloody noses and crack'd crowns,</div>
                              <div class="line">And pass them current too. God's me, my horse!</div>
                              <div class="line">What say'st thou, Kate? what would'st thou</div>
                              <div class="line">have with me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you not love me? do you not, indeed?</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, do not then; for since you love me not,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not love myself. Do you not love me?</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, tell me if you speak in jest or no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, wilt thou see me ride?</div>
                              <div class="line">And when I am on horseback, I will swear</div>
                              <div class="line">I love thee infinitely. But hark you, Kate;</div>
                              <div class="line">I must not have you henceforth question me</div>
                              <div class="line">Whither I go, nor reason whereabout:</div>
                              <div class="line">Whither I must, I must; and, to conclude,</div>
                              <div class="line">This evening must I leave you, gentle Kate.</div>
                              <div class="line">I know you wise, but yet no farther wise</div>
                              <div class="line">Than Harry Percy's wife: constant you are,</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet a woman: and for secrecy,</div>
                              <div class="line">No lady closer; for I well believe</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wilt not utter what thou dost not know;</div>
                              <div class="line">And so far will I trust thee, gentle Kate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">How! so far?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Not an inch further. But hark you, Kate:</div>
                              <div class="line">Whither I go, thither shall you go too;</div>
                              <div class="line">To-day will I set forth, to-morrow you.</div>
                              <div class="line">Will this content you, Kate?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">It must of force.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  The Boar's-Head Tavern, Eastcheap.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter PRINCE HENRY and POINS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ned, prithee, come out of that fat room, and lend me</div>
                              <div class="line">thy hand to laugh a little.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Where hast been, Hal?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">With three or four loggerheads amongst three or four</div>
                              <div class="line">score hogsheads. I have sounded the very</div>
                              <div class="line">base-string of humility. Sirrah, I am sworn brother</div>
                              <div class="line">to a leash of drawers; and can call them all by</div>
                              <div class="line">their christen names, as Tom, Dick, and Francis.</div>
                              <div class="line">They take it already upon their salvation, that</div>
                              <div class="line">though I be but the prince of Wales, yet I am king</div>
                              <div class="line">of courtesy; and tell me flatly I am no proud Jack,</div>
                              <div class="line">like Falstaff, but a Corinthian, a lad of mettle, a</div>
                              <div class="line">good boy, by the Lord, so they call me, and when I</div>
                              <div class="line">am king of England, I shall command all the good</div>
                              <div class="line">lads in Eastcheap. They call drinking deep, dyeing</div>
                              <div class="line">scarlet; and when you breathe in your watering, they</div>
                              <div class="line">cry  'hem!' and bid you play it off. To conclude, I</div>
                              <div class="line">am so good a proficient in one quarter of an hour,</div>
                              <div class="line">that I can drink with any tinker in his own language</div>
                              <div class="line">during my life. I tell thee, Ned, thou hast lost</div>
                              <div class="line">much honour, that thou wert not with me in this sweet</div>
                              <div class="line">action. But, sweet Ned,--to sweeten which name of</div>
                              <div class="line">Ned, I give thee this pennyworth of sugar, clapped</div>
                              <div class="line">even now into my hand by an under-skinker, one that</div>
                              <div class="line">never spake other English in his life than 'Eight</div>
                              <div class="line">shillings and sixpence' and 'You are welcome,' with</div>
                              <div class="line">this shrill addition, 'Anon, anon, sir! Score a pint</div>
                              <div class="line">of bastard in the Half-Moon,' or so. But, Ned, to</div>
                              <div class="line">drive away the time till Falstaff come, I prithee,</div>
                              <div class="line">do thou stand in some by-room, while I question my</div>
                              <div class="line">puny drawer to what end he gave me the sugar; and do</div>
                              <div class="line">thou never leave calling 'Francis,' that his tale</div>
                              <div class="line">to me may be nothing but 'Anon.' Step aside, and</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll show thee a precedent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Francis!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art perfect.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Francis!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit POINS</p>
                        <p>Enter FRANCIS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon, anon, sir. Look down into the Pomgarnet, Ralph.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Come hither, Francis.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">How long hast thou to serve, Francis?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Forsooth, five years, and as much as to--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Francis!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon, anon, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Five year! by'r lady, a long lease for the clinking</div>
                              <div class="line">of pewter. But, Francis, darest thou be so valiant</div>
                              <div class="line">as to play the coward with thy indenture and show it</div>
                              <div class="line">a fair pair of heels and run from it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, sir, I'll be sworn upon all the books in</div>
                              <div class="line">England, I could find in my heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Francis!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">How old art thou, Francis?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me see--about Michaelmas next I shall be--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Francis!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon, sir. Pray stay a little, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but hark you, Francis: for the sugar thou</div>
                              <div class="line">gavest me,'twas a pennyworth, wast't not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, I would it had been two!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">I will give thee for it a thousand pound: ask me</div>
                              <div class="line">when thou wilt, and thou shalt have it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Francis!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon, anon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon, Francis? No, Francis; but to-morrow, Francis;</div>
                              <div class="line">or, Francis, o' Thursday; or indeed, Francis, when</div>
                              <div class="line">thou wilt. But, Francis!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt thou rob this leathern jerkin, crystal-button,</div>
                              <div class="line">not-pated, agate-ring, puke-stocking, caddis-garter,</div>
                              <div class="line">smooth-tongue, Spanish-pouch,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, sir, who do you mean?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, your brown bastard is your only drink;</div>
                              <div class="line">for look you, Francis, your white canvas doublet</div>
                              <div class="line">will sully: in Barbary, sir, it cannot come to so much.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">What, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Francis!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, you rogue! dost thou not hear them call?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Here they both call him; the drawer stands amazed,
not knowing which way to go</p>
                        <p>Enter Vintner</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Vintner</div>
                              <div class="line">What, standest thou still, and hearest such a</div>
                              <div class="line">calling? Look to the guests within.</div>
                              <p>Exit Francis</p>
                              <div class="line">My lord, old Sir John, with half-a-dozen more, are</div>
                              <div class="line">at the door: shall I let them in?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Let them alone awhile, and then open the door.</div>
                              <p>Exit Vintner</p>
                              <div class="line">Poins!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter POINS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon, anon, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, Falstaff and the rest of the thieves are at</div>
                              <div class="line">the door: shall we be merry?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">As merry as crickets, my lad. But hark ye; what</div>
                              <div class="line">cunning match have you made with this jest of the</div>
                              <div class="line">drawer? come, what's the issue?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">I am now of all humours that have showed themselves</div>
                              <div class="line">humours since the old days of goodman Adam to the</div>
                              <div class="line">pupil age of this present twelve o'clock at midnight.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter FRANCIS</p>
                              <div class="line">What's o'clock, Francis?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon, anon, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">That ever this fellow should have fewer words than a</div>
                              <div class="line">parrot, and yet the son of a woman! His industry is</div>
                              <div class="line">upstairs and downstairs; his eloquence the parcel of</div>
                              <div class="line">a reckoning. I am not yet of Percy's mind, the</div>
                              <div class="line">Hotspur of the north; he that kills me some six or</div>
                              <div class="line">seven dozen of Scots at a breakfast, washes his</div>
                              <div class="line">hands, and says to his wife 'Fie upon this quiet</div>
                              <div class="line">life! I want work.' 'O my sweet Harry,' says she,</div>
                              <div class="line">'how many hast thou killed to-day?' 'Give my roan</div>
                              <div class="line">horse a drench,' says he; and answers 'Some</div>
                              <div class="line">fourteen,' an hour after; 'a trifle, a trifle.' I</div>
                              <div class="line">prithee, call in Falstaff: I'll play Percy, and</div>
                              <div class="line">that damned brawn shall play Dame Mortimer his</div>
                              <div class="line">wife. 'Rivo!' says the drunkard. Call in ribs, call in tallow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF, GADSHILL, BARDOLPH, and PETO;
FRANCIS following with wine</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, Jack: where hast thou been?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">A plague of all cowards, I say, and a vengeance too!</div>
                              <div class="line">marry, and amen! Give me a cup of sack, boy. Ere I</div>
                              <div class="line">lead this life long, I'll sew nether stocks and mend</div>
                              <div class="line">them and foot them too. A plague of all cowards!</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me a cup of sack, rogue. Is there no virtue extant?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>He drinks</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Didst thou never see Titan kiss a dish of butter?</div>
                              <div class="line">pitiful-hearted Titan, that melted at the sweet tale</div>
                              <div class="line">of the sun's! if thou didst, then behold that compound.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">You rogue, here's lime in this sack too: there is</div>
                              <div class="line">nothing but roguery to be found in villanous man:</div>
                              <div class="line">yet a coward is worse than a cup of sack with lime</div>
                              <div class="line">in it. A villanous coward! Go thy ways, old Jack;</div>
                              <div class="line">die when thou wilt, if manhood, good manhood, be</div>
                              <div class="line">not forgot upon the face of the earth, then am I a</div>
                              <div class="line">shotten herring. There live not three good men</div>
                              <div class="line">unhanged in England; and one of them is fat and</div>
                              <div class="line">grows old: God help the while! a bad world, I say.</div>
                              <div class="line">I would I were a weaver; I could sing psalms or any</div>
                              <div class="line">thing. A plague of all cowards, I say still.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, wool-sack! what mutter you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">A king's son! If I do not beat thee out of thy</div>
                              <div class="line">kingdom with a dagger of lath, and drive all thy</div>
                              <div class="line">subjects afore thee like a flock of wild-geese,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll never wear hair on my face more. You Prince of Wales!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, you whoreson round man, what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Are not you a coward? answer me to that: and Poins there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Zounds, ye fat paunch, an ye call me coward, by the</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord, I'll stab thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I call thee coward! I'll see thee damned ere I call</div>
                              <div class="line">thee coward: but I would give a thousand pound I</div>
                              <div class="line">could run as fast as thou canst. You are straight</div>
                              <div class="line">enough in the shoulders, you care not who sees your</div>
                              <div class="line">back: call you that backing of your friends? A</div>
                              <div class="line">plague upon such backing! give me them that will</div>
                              <div class="line">face me. Give me a cup of sack: I am a rogue, if I</div>
                              <div class="line">drunk to-day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">O villain! thy lips are scarce wiped since thou</div>
                              <div class="line">drunkest last.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">All's one for that.</div>
                              <p>He drinks</p>
                              <div class="line">A plague of all cowards, still say I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter! there be four of us here have</div>
                              <div class="line">ta'en a thousand pound this day morning.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is it, Jack? where is it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is it! taken from us it is: a hundred upon</div>
                              <div class="line">poor four of us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">What, a hundred, man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a rogue, if I were not at half-sword with a</div>
                              <div class="line">dozen of them two hours together. I have 'scaped by</div>
                              <div class="line">miracle. I am eight times thrust through the</div>
                              <div class="line">doublet, four through the hose; my buckler cut</div>
                              <div class="line">through and through; my sword hacked like a</div>
                              <div class="line">hand-saw--ecce signum! I never dealt better since</div>
                              <div class="line">I was a man: all would not do. A plague of all</div>
                              <div class="line">cowards! Let them speak: if they speak more or</div>
                              <div class="line">less than truth, they are villains and the sons of darkness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak, sirs; how was it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">We four set upon some dozen--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Sixteen at least, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">And bound them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no, they were not bound.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">You rogue, they were bound, every man of them; or I</div>
                              <div class="line">am a Jew else, an Ebrew Jew.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GADSHILL</div>
                              <div class="line">As we were sharing, some six or seven fresh men set upon us--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">And unbound the rest, and then come in the other.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">What, fought you with them all?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">All! I know not what you call all; but if I fought</div>
                              <div class="line">not with fifty of them, I am a bunch of radish: if</div>
                              <div class="line">there were not two or three and fifty upon poor old</div>
                              <div class="line">Jack, then am I no two-legged creature.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray God you have not murdered some of them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, that's past praying for: I have peppered two</div>
                              <div class="line">of them; two I am sure I have paid, two rogues</div>
                              <div class="line">in buckram suits. I tell thee what, Hal, if I tell</div>
                              <div class="line">thee a lie, spit in my face, call me horse. Thou</div>
                              <div class="line">knowest my old ward; here I lay and thus I bore my</div>
                              <div class="line">point. Four rogues in buckram let drive at me--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">What, four? thou saidst but two even now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Four, Hal; I told thee four.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, ay, he said four.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">These four came all a-front, and mainly thrust at</div>
                              <div class="line">me. I made me no more ado but took all their seven</div>
                              <div class="line">points in my target, thus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Seven? why, there were but four even now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">In buckram?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, four, in buckram suits.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Seven, by these hilts, or I am a villain else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, let him alone; we shall have more anon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou hear me, Hal?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and mark thee too, Jack.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Do so, for it is worth the listening to. These nine</div>
                              <div class="line">in buckram that I told thee of--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">So, two more already.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Their points being broken,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Down fell their hose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Began to give me ground: but I followed me close,</div>
                              <div class="line">came in foot and hand; and with a thought seven of</div>
                              <div class="line">the eleven I paid.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">O monstrous! eleven buckram men grown out of two!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">But, as the devil would have it, three misbegotten</div>
                              <div class="line">knaves in Kendal green came at my back and let drive</div>
                              <div class="line">at me; for it was so dark, Hal, that thou couldst</div>
                              <div class="line">not see thy hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">These lies are like their father that begets them;</div>
                              <div class="line">gross as a mountain, open, palpable. Why, thou</div>
                              <div class="line">clay-brained guts, thou knotty-pated fool, thou</div>
                              <div class="line">whoreson, obscene, grease tallow-catch,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What, art thou mad? art thou mad? is not the truth</div>
                              <div class="line">the truth?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how couldst thou know these men in Kendal</div>
                              <div class="line">green, when it was so dark thou couldst not see thy</div>
                              <div class="line">hand? come, tell us your reason: what sayest thou to this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, your reason, Jack, your reason.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What, upon compulsion? 'Zounds, an I were at the</div>
                              <div class="line">strappado, or all the racks in the world, I would</div>
                              <div class="line">not tell you on compulsion. Give you a reason on</div>
                              <div class="line">compulsion! If reasons were as plentiful as</div>
                              <div class="line">blackberries, I would give no man a reason upon</div>
                              <div class="line">compulsion, I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll be no longer guilty of this sin; this sanguine</div>
                              <div class="line">coward, this bed-presser, this horseback-breaker,</div>
                              <div class="line">this huge hill of flesh,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">'Sblood, you starveling, you elf-skin, you dried</div>
                              <div class="line">neat's tongue, you bull's pizzle, you stock-fish! O</div>
                              <div class="line">for breath to utter what is like thee! you</div>
                              <div class="line">tailor's-yard, you sheath, you bowcase; you vile</div>
                              <div class="line">standing-tuck,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, breathe awhile, and then to it again: and</div>
                              <div class="line">when thou hast tired thyself in base comparisons,</div>
                              <div class="line">hear me speak but this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark, Jack.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">We two saw you four set on four and bound them, and</div>
                              <div class="line">were masters of their wealth. Mark now, how a plain</div>
                              <div class="line">tale shall put you down. Then did we two set on you</div>
                              <div class="line">four; and, with a word, out-faced you from your</div>
                              <div class="line">prize, and have it; yea, and can show it you here in</div>
                              <div class="line">the house: and, Falstaff, you carried your guts</div>
                              <div class="line">away as nimbly, with as quick dexterity, and roared</div>
                              <div class="line">for mercy and still run and roared, as ever I heard</div>
                              <div class="line">bull-calf. What a slave art thou, to hack thy sword</div>
                              <div class="line">as thou hast done, and then say it was in fight!</div>
                              <div class="line">What trick, what device, what starting-hole, canst</div>
                              <div class="line">thou now find out to hide thee from this open and</div>
                              <div class="line">apparent shame?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, let's hear, Jack; what trick hast thou now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">By the Lord, I knew ye as well as he that made ye.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, hear you, my masters: was it for me to kill the</div>
                              <div class="line">heir-apparent? should I turn upon the true prince?</div>
                              <div class="line">why, thou knowest I am as valiant as Hercules: but</div>
                              <div class="line">beware instinct; the lion will not touch the true</div>
                              <div class="line">prince. Instinct is a great matter; I was now a</div>
                              <div class="line">coward on instinct. I shall think the better of</div>
                              <div class="line">myself and thee during my life; I for a valiant</div>
                              <div class="line">lion, and thou for a true prince. But, by the Lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">lads, I am glad you have the money. Hostess, clap</div>
                              <div class="line">to the doors: watch to-night, pray to-morrow.</div>
                              <div class="line">Gallants, lads, boys, hearts of gold, all the titles</div>
                              <div class="line">of good fellowship come to you! What, shall we be</div>
                              <div class="line">merry? shall we have a play extempore?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Content; and the argument shall be thy running away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, no more of that, Hal, an thou lovest me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Hostess</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">O Jesu, my lord the prince!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my lady the hostess! what sayest thou to</div>
                              <div class="line">me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, my lord, there is a nobleman of the court at</div>
                              <div class="line">door would speak with you: he says he comes from</div>
                              <div class="line">your father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Give him as much as will make him a royal man, and</div>
                              <div class="line">send him back again to my mother.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What manner of man is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">An old man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What doth gravity out of his bed at midnight? Shall</div>
                              <div class="line">I give him his answer?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, do, Jack.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, and I'll send him packing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit FALSTAFF</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, sirs: by'r lady, you fought fair; so did you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Peto; so did you, Bardolph: you are lions too, you</div>
                              <div class="line">ran away upon instinct, you will not touch the true</div>
                              <div class="line">prince; no, fie!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, I ran when I saw others run.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, tell me now in earnest, how came Falstaff's</div>
                              <div class="line">sword so hacked?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, he hacked it with his dagger, and said he would</div>
                              <div class="line">swear truth out of England but he would make you</div>
                              <div class="line">believe it was done in fight, and persuaded us to do the like.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, and to tickle our noses with spear-grass to</div>
                              <div class="line">make them bleed, and then to beslubber our garments</div>
                              <div class="line">with it and swear it was the blood of true men. I</div>
                              <div class="line">did that I did not this seven year before, I blushed</div>
                              <div class="line">to hear his monstrous devices.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">O villain, thou stolest a cup of sack eighteen years</div>
                              <div class="line">ago, and wert taken with the manner, and ever since</div>
                              <div class="line">thou hast blushed extempore. Thou hadst fire and</div>
                              <div class="line">sword on thy side, and yet thou rannest away: what</div>
                              <div class="line">instinct hadst thou for it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
