                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">Then be still.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Neither;'tis a woman's fault.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">Now God help thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">To the Welsh lady's bed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">What's that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace! she sings.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Here the lady sings a Welsh song</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, Kate, I'll have your song too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">Not mine, in good sooth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Not yours, in good sooth! Heart! you swear like a</div>
                              <div class="line">comfit-maker's wife. 'Not you, in good sooth,' and</div>
                              <div class="line">'as true as I live,' and 'as God shall mend me,' and</div>
                              <div class="line">'as sure as day,'</div>
                              <div class="line">And givest such sarcenet surety for thy oaths,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if thou never walk'st further than Finsbury.</div>
                              <div class="line">Swear me, Kate, like a lady as thou art,</div>
                              <div class="line">A good mouth-filling oath, and leave 'in sooth,'</div>
                              <div class="line">And such protest of pepper-gingerbread,</div>
                              <div class="line">To velvet-guards and Sunday-citizens.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not sing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis the next way to turn tailor, or be red-breast</div>
                              <div class="line">teacher. An the indentures be drawn, I'll away</div>
                              <div class="line">within these two hours; and so, come in when ye will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLENDOWER</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, Lord Mortimer; you are as slow</div>
                              <div class="line">As hot Lord Percy is on fire to go.</div>
                              <div class="line">By this our book is drawn; we'll but seal,</div>
                              <div class="line">And then to horse immediately.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MORTIMER</div>
                              <div class="line">With all my heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  London. The palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter KING HENRY IV, PRINCE HENRY, and others</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">Lords, give us leave; the Prince of Wales and I</div>
                              <div class="line">Must have some private conference; but be near at hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">For we shall presently have need of you.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt Lords</p>
                              <div class="line">I know not whether God will have it so,</div>
                              <div class="line">For some displeasing service I have done,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, in his secret doom, out of my blood</div>
                              <div class="line">He'll breed revengement and a scourge for me;</div>
                              <div class="line">But thou dost in thy passages of life</div>
                              <div class="line">Make me believe that thou art only mark'd</div>
                              <div class="line">For the hot vengeance and the rod of heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">To punish my mistreadings. Tell me else,</div>
                              <div class="line">Could such inordinate and low desires,</div>
                              <div class="line">Such poor, such bare, such lewd, such mean attempts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Such barren pleasures, rude society,</div>
                              <div class="line">As thou art match'd withal and grafted to,</div>
                              <div class="line">Accompany the greatness of thy blood</div>
                              <div class="line">And hold their level with thy princely heart?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">So please your majesty, I would I could</div>
                              <div class="line">Quit all offences with as clear excuse</div>
                              <div class="line">As well as I am doubtless I can purge</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself of many I am charged withal:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet such extenuation let me beg,</div>
                              <div class="line">As, in reproof of many tales devised,</div>
                              <div class="line">which oft the ear of greatness needs must hear,</div>
                              <div class="line">By smiling pick-thanks and base news-mongers,</div>
                              <div class="line">I may, for some things true, wherein my youth</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath faulty wander'd and irregular,</div>
                              <div class="line">Find pardon on my true submission.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">God pardon thee! yet let me wonder, Harry,</div>
                              <div class="line">At thy affections, which do hold a wing</div>
                              <div class="line">Quite from the flight of all thy ancestors.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy place in council thou hast rudely lost.</div>
                              <div class="line">Which by thy younger brother is supplied,</div>
                              <div class="line">And art almost an alien to the hearts</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all the court and princes of my blood:</div>
                              <div class="line">The hope and expectation of thy time</div>
                              <div class="line">Is ruin'd, and the soul of every man</div>
                              <div class="line">Prophetically doth forethink thy fall.</div>
                              <div class="line">Had I so lavish of my presence been,</div>
                              <div class="line">So common-hackney'd in the eyes of men,</div>
                              <div class="line">So stale and cheap to vulgar company,</div>
                              <div class="line">Opinion, that did help me to the crown,</div>
                              <div class="line">Had still kept loyal to possession</div>
                              <div class="line">And left me in reputeless banishment,</div>
                              <div class="line">A fellow of no mark nor likelihood.</div>
                              <div class="line">By being seldom seen, I could not stir</div>
                              <div class="line">But like a comet I was wonder'd at;</div>
                              <div class="line">That men would tell their children 'This is he;'</div>
                              <div class="line">Others would say 'Where, which is Bolingbroke?'</div>
                              <div class="line">And then I stole all courtesy from heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">And dress'd myself in such humility</div>
                              <div class="line">That I did pluck allegiance from men's hearts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Loud shouts and salutations from their mouths,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in the presence of the crowned king.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus did I keep my person fresh and new;</div>
                              <div class="line">My presence, like a robe pontifical,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ne'er seen but wonder'd at: and so my state,</div>
                              <div class="line">Seldom but sumptuous, showed like a feast</div>
                              <div class="line">And won by rareness such solemnity.</div>
                              <div class="line">The skipping king, he ambled up and down</div>
                              <div class="line">With shallow jesters and rash bavin wits,</div>
                              <div class="line">Soon kindled and soon burnt; carded his state,</div>
                              <div class="line">Mingled his royalty with capering fools,</div>
                              <div class="line">Had his great name profaned with their scorns</div>
                              <div class="line">And gave his countenance, against his name,</div>
                              <div class="line">To laugh at gibing boys and stand the push</div>
                              <div class="line">Of every beardless vain comparative,</div>
                              <div class="line">Grew a companion to the common streets,</div>
                              <div class="line">Enfeoff'd himself to popularity;</div>
                              <div class="line">That, being daily swallow'd by men's eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">They surfeited with honey and began</div>
                              <div class="line">To loathe the taste of sweetness, whereof a little</div>
                              <div class="line">More than a little is by much too much.</div>
                              <div class="line">So when he had occasion to be seen,</div>
                              <div class="line">He was but as the cuckoo is in June,</div>
                              <div class="line">Heard, not regarded; seen, but with such eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">As, sick and blunted with community,</div>
                              <div class="line">Afford no extraordinary gaze,</div>
                              <div class="line">Such as is bent on sun-like majesty</div>
                              <div class="line">When it shines seldom in admiring eyes;</div>
                              <div class="line">But rather drowzed and hung their eyelids down,</div>
                              <div class="line">Slept in his face and render'd such aspect</div>
                              <div class="line">As cloudy men use to their adversaries,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being with his presence glutted, gorged and full.</div>
                              <div class="line">And in that very line, Harry, standest thou;</div>
                              <div class="line">For thou has lost thy princely privilege</div>
                              <div class="line">With vile participation: not an eye</div>
                              <div class="line">But is a-weary of thy common sight,</div>
                              <div class="line">Save mine, which hath desired to see thee more;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which now doth that I would not have it do,</div>
                              <div class="line">Make blind itself with foolish tenderness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall hereafter, my thrice gracious lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be more myself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">For all the world</div>
                              <div class="line">As thou art to this hour was Richard then</div>
                              <div class="line">When I from France set foot at Ravenspurgh,</div>
                              <div class="line">And even as I was then is Percy now.</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, by my sceptre and my soul to boot,</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath more worthy interest to the state</div>
                              <div class="line">Than thou the shadow of succession;</div>
                              <div class="line">For of no right, nor colour like to right,</div>
                              <div class="line">He doth fill fields with harness in the realm,</div>
                              <div class="line">Turns head against the lion's armed jaws,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, being no more in debt to years than thou,</div>
                              <div class="line">Leads ancient lords and reverend bishops on</div>
                              <div class="line">To bloody battles and to bruising arms.</div>
                              <div class="line">What never-dying honour hath he got</div>
                              <div class="line">Against renowned Douglas! whose high deeds,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose hot incursions and great name in arms</div>
                              <div class="line">Holds from all soldiers chief majority</div>
                              <div class="line">And military title capital</div>
                              <div class="line">Through all the kingdoms that acknowledge Christ:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thrice hath this Hotspur, Mars in swathling clothes,</div>
                              <div class="line">This infant warrior, in his enterprises</div>
                              <div class="line">Discomfited great Douglas, ta'en him once,</div>
                              <div class="line">Enlarged him and made a friend of him,</div>
                              <div class="line">To fill the mouth of deep defiance up</div>
                              <div class="line">And shake the peace and safety of our throne.</div>
                              <div class="line">And what say you to this? Percy, Northumberland,</div>
                              <div class="line">The Archbishop's grace of York, Douglas, Mortimer,</div>
                              <div class="line">Capitulate against us and are up.</div>
                              <div class="line">But wherefore do I tell these news to thee?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, Harry, do I tell thee of my foes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which art my near'st and dearest enemy?</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou that art like enough, through vassal fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Base inclination and the start of spleen</div>
                              <div class="line">To fight against me under Percy's pay,</div>
                              <div class="line">To dog his heels and curtsy at his frowns,</div>
                              <div class="line">To show how much thou art degenerate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not think so; you shall not find it so:</div>
                              <div class="line">And God forgive them that so much have sway'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Your majesty's good thoughts away from me!</div>
                              <div class="line">I will redeem all this on Percy's head</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the closing of some glorious day</div>
                              <div class="line">Be bold to tell you that I am your son;</div>
                              <div class="line">When I will wear a garment all of blood</div>
                              <div class="line">And stain my favours in a bloody mask,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, wash'd away, shall scour my shame with it:</div>
                              <div class="line">And that shall be the day, whene'er it lights,</div>
                              <div class="line">That this same child of honour and renown,</div>
                              <div class="line">This gallant Hotspur, this all-praised knight,</div>
                              <div class="line">And your unthought-of Harry chance to meet.</div>
                              <div class="line">For every honour sitting on his helm,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would they were multitudes, and on my head</div>
                              <div class="line">My shames redoubled! for the time will come,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I shall make this northern youth exchange</div>
                              <div class="line">His glorious deeds for my indignities.</div>
                              <div class="line">Percy is but my factor, good my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">To engross up glorious deeds on my behalf;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I will call him to so strict account,</div>
                              <div class="line">That he shall render every glory up,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, even the slightest worship of his time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or I will tear the reckoning from his heart.</div>
                              <div class="line">This, in the name of God, I promise here:</div>
                              <div class="line">The which if He be pleased I shall perform,</div>
                              <div class="line">I do beseech your majesty may salve</div>
                              <div class="line">The long-grown wounds of my intemperance:</div>
                              <div class="line">If not, the end of life cancels all bands;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I will die a hundred thousand deaths</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere break the smallest parcel of this vow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">A hundred thousand rebels die in this:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou shalt have charge and sovereign trust herein.</div>
                              <p>Enter BLUNT</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, good Blunt? thy looks are full of speed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR WALTER BLUNT</div>
                              <div class="line">So hath the business that I come to speak of.</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Mortimer of Scotland hath sent word</div>
                              <div class="line">That Douglas and the English rebels met</div>
                              <div class="line">The eleventh of this month at Shrewsbury</div>
                              <div class="line">A mighty and a fearful head they are,</div>
                              <div class="line">If promises be kept on every hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">As ever offer'd foul play in the state.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">The Earl of Westmoreland set forth to-day;</div>
                              <div class="line">With him my son, Lord John of Lancaster;</div>
                              <div class="line">For this advertisement is five days old:</div>
                              <div class="line">On Wednesday next, Harry, you shall set forward;</div>
                              <div class="line">On Thursday we ourselves will march: our meeting</div>
                              <div class="line">Is Bridgenorth: and, Harry, you shall march</div>
                              <div class="line">Through Gloucestershire; by which account,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our business valued, some twelve days hence</div>
                              <div class="line">Our general forces at Bridgenorth shall meet.</div>
                              <div class="line">Our hands are full of business: let's away;</div>
                              <div class="line">Advantage feeds him fat, while men delay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. Scene III  Eastcheap. The Boar's-Head Tavern.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF and BARDOLPH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Bardolph, am I not fallen away vilely since this last</div>
                              <div class="line">action? do I not bate? do I not dwindle? Why my</div>
                              <div class="line">skin hangs about me like an like an old lady's loose</div>
                              <div class="line">gown; I am withered like an old apple-john. Well,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll repent, and that suddenly, while I am in some</div>
                              <div class="line">liking; I shall be out of heart shortly, and then I</div>
                              <div class="line">shall have no strength to repent. An I have not</div>
                              <div class="line">forgotten what the inside of a church is made of, I</div>
                              <div class="line">am a peppercorn, a brewer's horse: the inside of a</div>
                              <div class="line">church! Company, villanous company, hath been the</div>
                              <div class="line">spoil of me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John, you are so fretful, you cannot live long.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, there is it: come sing me a bawdy song; make</div>
                              <div class="line">me merry. I was as virtuously given as a gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">need to be; virtuous enough; swore little; diced not</div>
                              <div class="line">above seven times a week; went to a bawdy-house once</div>
                              <div class="line">in a quarter--of an hour; paid money that I</div>
                              <div class="line">borrowed, three of four times; lived well and in</div>
                              <div class="line">good compass: and now I live out of all order, out</div>
                              <div class="line">of all compass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, you are so fat, Sir John, that you must needs</div>
                              <div class="line">be out of all compass, out of all reasonable</div>
                              <div class="line">compass, Sir John.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Do thou amend thy face, and I'll amend my life:</div>
                              <div class="line">thou art our admiral, thou bearest the lantern in</div>
                              <div class="line">the poop, but 'tis in the nose of thee; thou art the</div>
                              <div class="line">Knight of the Burning Lamp.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, Sir John, my face does you no harm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I'll be sworn; I make as good use of it as many</div>
                              <div class="line">a man doth of a Death's-head or a memento mori: I</div>
                              <div class="line">never see thy face but I think upon hell-fire and</div>
                              <div class="line">Dives that lived in purple; for there he is in his</div>
                              <div class="line">robes, burning, burning. If thou wert any way</div>
                              <div class="line">given to virtue, I would swear by thy face; my oath</div>
                              <div class="line">should be 'By this fire, that's God's angel:' but</div>
                              <div class="line">thou art altogether given over; and wert indeed, but</div>
                              <div class="line">for the light in thy face, the son of utter</div>
                              <div class="line">darkness. When thou rannest up Gadshill in the</div>
                              <div class="line">night to catch my horse, if I did not think thou</div>
                              <div class="line">hadst been an ignis fatuus or a ball of wildfire,</div>
                              <div class="line">there's no purchase in money. O, thou art a</div>
                              <div class="line">perpetual triumph, an everlasting bonfire-light!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast saved me a thousand marks in links and</div>
                              <div class="line">torches, walking with thee in the night betwixt</div>
                              <div class="line">tavern and tavern: but the sack that thou hast</div>
                              <div class="line">drunk me would have bought me lights as good cheap</div>
                              <div class="line">at the dearest chandler's in Europe. I have</div>
                              <div class="line">maintained that salamander of yours with fire any</div>
                              <div class="line">time this two and thirty years; God reward me for</div>
                              <div class="line">it!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">'Sblood, I would my face were in your belly!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">God-a-mercy! so should I be sure to be heart-burned.</div>
                              <p>Enter Hostess</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Dame Partlet the hen! have you inquired</div>
                              <div class="line">yet who picked my pocket?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, Sir John, what do you think, Sir John? do you</div>
                              <div class="line">think I keep thieves in my house? I have searched,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have inquired, so has my husband, man by man, boy</div>
                              <div class="line">by boy, servant by servant: the tithe of a hair</div>
                              <div class="line">was never lost in my house before.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Ye lie, hostess: Bardolph was shaved and lost many</div>
                              <div class="line">a hair; and I'll be sworn my pocket was picked. Go</div>
                              <div class="line">to, you are a woman, go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, I? no; I defy thee: God's light, I was never</div>
                              <div class="line">called so in mine own house before.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to, I know you well enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">No, Sir John; You do not know me, Sir John. I know</div>
                              <div class="line">you, Sir John: you owe me money, Sir John; and now</div>
                              <div class="line">you pick a quarrel to beguile me of it: I bought</div>
                              <div class="line">you a dozen of shirts to your back.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Dowlas, filthy dowlas: I have given them away to</div>
                              <div class="line">bakers' wives, and they have made bolters of them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, as I am a true woman, holland of eight</div>
                              <div class="line">shillings an ell. You owe money here besides, Sir</div>
                              <div class="line">John, for your diet and by-drinkings, and money lent</div>
                              <div class="line">you, four and twenty pound.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">He had his part of it; let him pay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">He? alas, he is poor; he hath nothing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">How! poor? look upon his face; what call you rich?</div>
                              <div class="line">let them coin his nose, let them coin his cheeks:</div>
                              <div class="line">Ill not pay a denier. What, will you make a younker</div>
                              <div class="line">of me? shall I not take mine case in mine inn but I</div>
                              <div class="line">shall have my pocket picked? I have lost a</div>
                              <div class="line">seal-ring of my grandfather's worth forty mark.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">O Jesu, I have heard the prince tell him, I know not</div>
                              <div class="line">how oft, that ring was copper!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">How! the prince is a Jack, a sneak-cup: 'sblood, an</div>
                              <div class="line">he were here, I would cudgel him like a dog, if he</div>
                              <div class="line">would say so.</div>
                              <p>Enter PRINCE HENRY and PETO, marching, and FALSTAFF
meets them playing on his truncheon like a life</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, lad! is the wind in that door, i' faith?</div>
                              <div class="line">must we all march?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, two and two, Newgate fashion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I pray you, hear me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">What sayest thou, Mistress Quickly? How doth thy</div>
                              <div class="line">husband? I love him well; he is an honest man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">Good my lord, hear me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, let her alone, and list to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">What sayest thou, Jack?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">The other night I fell asleep here behind the arras</div>
                              <div class="line">and had my pocket picked: this house is turned</div>
                              <div class="line">bawdy-house; they pick pockets.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">What didst thou lose, Jack?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt thou believe me, Hal? three or four bonds of</div>
                              <div class="line">forty pound apiece, and a seal-ring of my</div>
                              <div class="line">grandfather's.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">A trifle, some eight-penny matter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">So I told him, my lord; and I said I heard your</div>
                              <div class="line">grace say so: and, my lord, he speaks most vilely</div>
                              <div class="line">of you, like a foul-mouthed man as he is; and said</div>
                              <div class="line">he would cudgel you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">What! he did not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">There's neither faith, truth, nor womanhood in me else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">There's no more faith in thee than in a stewed</div>
                              <div class="line">prune; nor no more truth in thee than in a drawn</div>
                              <div class="line">fox; and for womanhood, Maid Marian may be the</div>
                              <div class="line">deputy's wife of the ward to thee. Go, you thing,</div>
                              <div class="line">go</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, what thing? what thing?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What thing! why, a thing to thank God on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">I am no thing to thank God on, I would thou</div>
                              <div class="line">shouldst know it; I am an honest man's wife: and,</div>
                              <div class="line">setting thy knighthood aside, thou art a knave to</div>
                              <div class="line">call me so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Setting thy womanhood aside, thou art a beast to say</div>
                              <div class="line">otherwise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, what beast, thou knave, thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What beast! why, an otter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">An otter, Sir John! Why an otter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, she's neither fish nor flesh; a man knows not</div>
                              <div class="line">where to have her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art an unjust man in saying so: thou or any</div>
                              <div class="line">man knows where to have me, thou knave, thou!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou sayest true, hostess; and he slanders thee most grossly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">So he doth you, my lord; and said this other day you</div>
                              <div class="line">ought him a thousand pound.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, do I owe you a thousand pound?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">A thousand pound, Ha! a million: thy love is worth</div>
                              <div class="line">a million: thou owest me thy love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, my lord, he called you Jack, and said he would</div>
                              <div class="line">cudgel you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Did I, Bardolph?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, Sir John, you said so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, if he said my ring was copper.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">I say 'tis copper: darest thou be as good as thy word now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, Hal, thou knowest, as thou art but man, I dare:</div>
                              <div class="line">but as thou art prince, I fear thee as I fear the</div>
                              <div class="line">roaring of a lion's whelp.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">And why not as the lion?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">The king is to be feared as the lion: dost thou</div>
                              <div class="line">think I'll fear thee as I fear thy father? nay, an</div>
                              <div class="line">I do, I pray God my girdle break.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">O, if it should, how would thy guts fall about thy</div>
                              <div class="line">knees! But, sirrah, there's no room for faith,</div>
                              <div class="line">truth, nor honesty in this bosom of thine; it is all</div>
                              <div class="line">filled up with guts and midriff. Charge an honest</div>
                              <div class="line">woman with picking thy pocket! why, thou whoreson,</div>
                              <div class="line">impudent, embossed rascal, if there were anything in</div>
                              <div class="line">thy pocket but tavern-reckonings, memorandums of</div>
                              <div class="line">bawdy-houses, and one poor penny-worth of</div>
                              <div class="line">sugar-candy to make thee long-winded, if thy pocket</div>
                              <div class="line">were enriched with any other injuries but these, I</div>
                              <div class="line">am a villain: and yet you will stand to if; you will</div>
                              <div class="line">not pocket up wrong: art thou not ashamed?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou hear, Hal? thou knowest in the state of</div>
                              <div class="line">innocency Adam fell; and what should poor Jack</div>
                              <div class="line">Falstaff do in the days of villany? Thou seest I</div>
                              <div class="line">have more flesh than another man, and therefore more</div>
                              <div class="line">frailty. You confess then, you picked my pocket?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">It appears so by the story.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Hostess, I forgive thee: go, make ready breakfast;</div>
                              <div class="line">love thy husband, look to thy servants, cherish thy</div>
                              <div class="line">guests: thou shalt find me tractable to any honest</div>
                              <div class="line">reason: thou seest I am pacified still. Nay,</div>
                              <div class="line">prithee, be gone.</div>
                              <p>Exit Hostess</p>
                              <div class="line">Now Hal, to the news at court: for the robbery,</div>
                              <div class="line">lad, how is that answered?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">O, my sweet beef, I must still be good angel to</div>
                              <div class="line">thee: the money is paid back again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">O, I do not like that paying back; 'tis a double labour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">I am good friends with my father and may do any thing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Rob me the exchequer the first thing thou doest, and</div>
                              <div class="line">do it with unwashed hands too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Do, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">I have procured thee, Jack, a charge of foot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I would it had been of horse. Where shall I find</div>
                              <div class="line">one that can steal well? O for a fine thief, of the</div>
                              <div class="line">age of two and twenty or thereabouts! I am</div>
                              <div class="line">heinously unprovided. Well, God be thanked for</div>
                              <div class="line">these rebels, they offend none but the virtuous: I</div>
                              <div class="line">laud them, I praise them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Bardolph!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Go bear this letter to Lord John of Lancaster, to my</div>
                              <div class="line">brother John; this to my Lord of Westmoreland.</div>
                              <p>Exit Bardolph</p>
                              <div class="line">Go, Peto, to horse, to horse; for thou and I have</div>
                              <div class="line">thirty miles to ride yet ere dinner time.</div>
                              <p>Exit Peto</p>
                              <div class="line">Jack, meet me to-morrow in the temple hall at two</div>
                              <div class="line">o'clock in the afternoon.</div>
                              <div class="line">There shalt thou know thy charge; and there receive</div>
                              <div class="line">Money and order for their furniture.</div>
                              <div class="line">The land is burning; Percy stands on high;</div>
                              <div class="line">And either we or they must lower lie.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit PRINCE HENRY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Rare words! brave world! Hostess, my breakfast, come!</div>
                              <div class="line">O, I could wish this tavern were my drum!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  The rebel camp near Shrewsbury.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  A public road near Coventry.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  The rebel camp near Shrewsbury.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.5">4. SCENE IV.  York. The ARCHBISHOP'S palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  The rebel camp near Shrewsbury.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter HOTSPUR, WORCESTER, and DOUGLAS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Well said, my noble Scot: if speaking truth</div>
                              <div class="line">In this fine age were not thought flattery,</div>
                              <div class="line">Such attribution should the Douglas have,</div>
                              <div class="line">As not a soldier of this season's stamp</div>
                              <div class="line">Should go so general current through the world.</div>
                              <div class="line">By God, I cannot flatter; I do defy</div>
                              <div class="line">The tongues of soothers; but a braver place</div>
                              <div class="line">In my heart's love hath no man than yourself:</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, task me to my word; approve me, lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF DOUGLAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art the king of honour:</div>
                              <div class="line">No man so potent breathes upon the ground</div>
                              <div class="line">But I will beard him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Do so, and 'tis well.</div>
                              <p>Enter a Messenger with letters</p>
                              <div class="line">What letters hast thou there?--I can but thank you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">These letters come from your father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Letters from him! why comes he not himself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">He cannot come, my lord; he is grievous sick.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">'Zounds! how has he the leisure to be sick</div>
                              <div class="line">In such a rustling time? Who leads his power?</div>
                              <div class="line">Under whose government come they along?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">His letters bear his mind, not I, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, tell me, doth he keep his bed?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">He did, my lord, four days ere I set forth;</div>
                              <div class="line">And at the time of my departure thence</div>
                              <div class="line">He was much fear'd by his physicians.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">I would the state of time had first been whole</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere he by sickness had been visited:</div>
                              <div class="line">His health was never better worth than now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">Sick now! droop now! this sickness doth infect</div>
                              <div class="line">The very life-blood of our enterprise;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis catching hither, even to our camp.</div>
                              <div class="line">He writes me here, that inward sickness--</div>
                              <div class="line">And that his friends by deputation could not</div>
                              <div class="line">So soon be drawn, nor did he think it meet</div>
                              <div class="line">To lay so dangerous and dear a trust</div>
                              <div class="line">On any soul removed but on his own.</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet doth he give us bold advertisement,</div>
                              <div class="line">That with our small conjunction we should on,</div>
                              <div class="line">To see how fortune is disposed to us;</div>
                              <div class="line">For, as he writes, there is no quailing now.</div>
                              <div class="line">Because the king is certainly possess'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all our purposes. What say you to it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Your father's sickness is a maim to us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">A perilous gash, a very limb lopp'd off:</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet, in faith, it is not; his present want</div>
                              <div class="line">Seems more than we shall find it: were it good</div>
                              <div class="line">To set the exact wealth of all our states</div>
                              <div class="line">All at one cast? to set so rich a main</div>
                              <div class="line">On the nice hazard of one doubtful hour?</div>
                              <div class="line">It were not good; for therein should we read</div>
                              <div class="line">The very bottom and the soul of hope,</div>
                              <div class="line">The very list, the very utmost bound</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all our fortunes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF DOUGLAS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, and so we should;</div>
                              <div class="line">Where now remains a sweet reversion:</div>
                              <div class="line">We may boldly spend upon the hope of what</div>
                              <div class="line">Is to come in:</div>
                              <div class="line">A comfort of retirement lives in this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">A rendezvous, a home to fly unto.</div>
                              <div class="line">If that the devil and mischance look big</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the maidenhead of our affairs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF WORCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet I would your father had been here.</div>
                              <div class="line">The quality and hair of our attempt</div>
                              <div class="line">Brooks no division: it will be thought</div>
                              <div class="line">By some, that know not why he is away,</div>
                              <div class="line">That wisdom, loyalty and mere dislike</div>
                              <div class="line">Of our proceedings kept the earl from hence:</div>
                              <div class="line">And think how such an apprehension</div>
                              <div class="line">May turn the tide of fearful faction</div>
                              <div class="line">And breed a kind of question in our cause;</div>
                              <div class="line">For well you know we of the offering side</div>
                              <div class="line">Must keep aloof from strict arbitrement,</div>
                              <div class="line">And stop all sight-holes, every loop from whence</div>
                              <div class="line">The eye of reason may pry in upon us:</div>
                              <div class="line">This absence of your father's draws a curtain,</div>
                              <div class="line">That shows the ignorant a kind of fear</div>
                              <div class="line">Before not dreamt of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">You strain too far.</div>
                              <div class="line">I rather of his absence make this use:</div>
                              <div class="line">It lends a lustre and more great opinion,</div>
                              <div class="line">A larger dare to our great enterprise,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than if the earl were here; for men must think,</div>
                              <div class="line">If we without his help can make a head</div>
                              <div class="line">To push against a kingdom, with his help</div>
                              <div class="line">We shall o'erturn it topsy-turvy down.</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet all goes well, yet all our joints are whole.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EARL OF DOUGLAS</div>
                              <div class="line">As heart can think: there is not such a word</div>
                              <div class="line">Spoke of in Scotland as this term of fear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter SIR RICHARD VERNON</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">My cousin Vernon, welcome, by my soul.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray God my news be worth a welcome, lord.</div>
                              <div class="line">The Earl of Westmoreland, seven thousand strong,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is marching hitherwards; with him Prince John.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">No harm: what more?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERNON</div>
                              <div class="line">And further, I have learn'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">The king himself in person is set forth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or hitherwards intended speedily,</div>
                              <div class="line">With strong and mighty preparation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOTSPUR</div>
                              <div class="line">He shall be welcome too. Where is his son,</div>
                              <div class="line">The nimble-footed madcap Prince of Wales,</div>
                              <div class="line">And his comrades, that daff'd the world aside,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bid it pass?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERNON</div>
                              <div class="line">All furnish'd, all in arms;</div>
                              <div class="line">All plumed like estridges that with the wind</div>
                              <div class="line">Baited like eagles having lately bathed;</div>
                              <div class="line">Glittering in golden coats, like images;</div>
                              <div class="line">As full of spirit as the month of May,</div>
                              <div class="line">And gorgeous as the sun at midsummer;</div>
                              <div class="line">Wanton as youthful goats, wild as young bulls.</div>
